# `PhraseTranslation` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| startTimeMs | `number` | Yes | Epoch start time of the phrase |
| participantPurpose | `string` | Yes | Purpose of the participant associated with the phrase |
| translatedText | `string` | Yes | Translation of the phrase |
